title: Ticket #3938: Improve "condor_status -schedd" output
description:
I'd like to see improvements in "condor_status -schedd" analogous to #3937.

In particular, I'd like to see improvements to the reporting of data (may require a new flag; "-data"? "-jobs"?).

For data:

  • Number of current upload / download processes.
  • Number of queued upload / download.
  • Bytes waiting in upload / download queue.
  • 5 minute average KB/s for upload / download

For jobs:

  • Average number of recent job starts.
  • Average number of shadow starts.
  • Average memory usage.

(probably over the last hour, but should be consistent with whatever we do in #3937).
